import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
from urllib.parse import urlparse

def scrape_headers(url):
    resp = requests.get(url)
    soup = BeautifulSoup(resp.text, 'html.parser')

    headers = soup.find_all('meta')
    for header in headers:
        if 'http' in urlparse(header.get('href')):
            print(header.get('name'))

            hrefs = [urlparse(f).url for f in header.get('hrefs', [])]
            if hrefs:
                for h in hrefs:
                    print(h)

            print("-" * 40)

from xml.etree import ElementTree
my_xml = """<root>
  <item>
    <name> Alice </name>
    <details>
      <bio>Adventurer</bio>
      <email>alice@experiment.com</email>
    </details>
  </item>
</root>"""

def parse_xml(xml_file):
    tree = ElementTree.fromstring(xml_file)
    root = tree.getroot()
    parsed_data = []
    for item in root.findall('item[details]'):
        details = item.find('details')
        parsed_data.append(details)
    return parsed_data

xml = open(xml_file, 'r').read()
parsed = parse_xml(xml.text)

print('Parsed data:', parsed)
